recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta, then add egg mixture.
Mix well until the sauce thickens.
Add black pepper to taste and serve.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.author: Chef Moha
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, and vanilla extract to the dry mixture.
Mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.
Let it cool before serving.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella into rounds.
Arrange them on a plate, alternating between tomato and mozzarella slices.
Tear basil leaves and sprinkle over the tomatoes and mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar on top.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Slice chicken breast into strips and marinate with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan or wok over high heat.
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, then set aside.
Stir-fry bell peppers and broccoli until tender-crisp.
Add the cooked chicken back to the pan and mix well.
Serve over steamed rice.

recipes.author: typicode

Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta, then add egg mixture.
Mix well until the sauce thickens.
Add black pepper to taste and serve.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Cook linguine pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté shrimp and garlic in olive oil until shrimp are pink.
Deglaze with white wine, add lemon juice, parsley, and red pepper flakes.
Toss with cooked pasta and serve.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Dice cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine with olives and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad.
Sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper. Toss gently.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet, drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened.
Warm tortillas and assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Slice eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes.
Layer vegetables in a baking dish, interspersed with sliced onions and minced garlic.
Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with Herbs de Provence.
Bake until vegetables are tender.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
recipes.author: typicode
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Make a pocket in each chicken breast.
Mix spinach, feta, garlic, salt, and pepper. Stuff into the chicken pockets.
Rub chicken with olive oil, sprinkle with paprika, and bake until cooked through.
